data.text:
Symboli Rudolf will be racing in the Twinkle 
Series this weekend. So…
data.processed:
󠁿Symboli Rudolf will be racing in the Twinkle 
󠁿Series this weekend. So…

data.text: Huh? Prez's race?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Huh? Prez's race?

data.text: Normally I'd love to go, but… Mmm…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Normally I'd love to go, but… Mmm…

data.text: Oh, but… that's right…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Oh, but… that's right…

data.text:
Prez'll win, just like she always does, right? 
So she'll be showered with praise again…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Prez'll win, just like she always does, right? 
󠁿So she'll be showered with praise again…

data.text:
Maybe… seeing that one more time will help me 
shake off whatever's been bothering me.
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: Why don't we go and find out?

data.processed:
󠁿Maybe… seeing that one more time will help me 
󠁿shake off whatever's been bothering me.

data.text: Alright, I'll go!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Alright, I'll go!

data.text: And so the day of Symboli Rudolf's race came.
data.processed: 󠁿And so the day of Symboli Rudolf's race came.

data.text:
Symboli Rudolf is leading! She's so quick, so 
fast!! A three, no four length lead!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Symboli Rudolf is leading! She's so quick, so 
󠁿fast!! A three, no four length lead!!

data.text:
Symboli Rudolf wins!! What overwhelming 
strength! This is how an "Emperor" races!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Symboli Rudolf wins!! What overwhelming 
󠁿strength! This is how an "Emperor" races!!

data.text: Emperor! Emperor! Emperor!!
data.name: Crowd
data.processed: 󠁿Emperor! Emperor! Emperor!!

data.text:
Prez was as great as ever… She's so strong, so 
fast, and the coolest Uma Musume.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Prez was as great as ever… She's so strong, so 
󠁿fast, and the coolest Uma Musume.

data.text: But…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿But…

data.text:
There's something I need to talk to her about. 
Will you come too?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿There's something I need to talk to her about. 
󠁿Will you come too?

data.text: I'm coming in!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿I'm coming in!

data.text:
Oh, if it isn't Teio… and I see you're here as 
well, Trainer-kun.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, if it isn't Teio… and I see you're here as 
󠁿well, Trainer-kun.

data.text:
How surprising. I would never have expected the 
excitable, impulsive Teio to actually knock 
before entering.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
󠁿How surprising. I would never have expected the 
󠁿excitable, impulsive Teio to actually knock 
󠁿before entering.

data.text:
Yeah… Actually, there's something 
I need to talk to you about.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah… Actually, there's something 
󠁿I need to talk to you about.

data.text: Hmm… Okay, what is it?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: 󠁿Hmm… Okay, what is it?

data.text:
Prez… You're my idol. You're the most amazing 
and coolest Uma Musume out there. I want to be 
just like you one day.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Prez… You're my idol. You're the most amazing 
󠁿and coolest Uma Musume out there. I want to be 
󠁿just like you one day.

data.text: It made me happy hearing everyone praise you.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿It made me happy hearing everyone praise you.

data.text:
And whenever I saw you smile back to your fans 
it would make me so excited.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿And whenever I saw you smile back to your fans 
󠁿it would make me so excited.

data.text: But… All of that is gone now…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿But… All of that is gone now…

data.text: Oh? What do you mean by that, Teio?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: 󠁿Oh? What do you mean by that, Teio?

data.text: Seeing everyone cheer for you after you beat me…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Seeing everyone cheer for you after you beat me…

data.text: It… it really made my chest hurt…
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿It… it really made my chest hurt…

data.text: Made your chest hurt…?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: 󠁿Made your chest hurt…?

data.text:
Yeah. It hurt so bad that I couldn't stop 
thinking about it… So I tried to run and run to 
get rid of it, but it wouldn't go away.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah. It hurt so bad that I couldn't stop 
󠁿thinking about it… So I tried to run and run to 
󠁿get rid of it, but it wouldn't go away.

data.text:
It's strange, isn't it? But after 
seeing your race today I think I finally 
understand what happened.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿It's strange, isn't it? But after 
󠁿seeing your race today I think I finally 
󠁿understand what happened.

data.text:
I… I want to become the best Uma Musume in the 
world. That's why I run.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿I… I want to become the best Uma Musume in the 
󠁿world. That's why I run.

data.text:
So I can't let anyone else be called amazing. 
No, I won't let anyone else be called amazing!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿So I can't let anyone else be called amazing. 
󠁿No, I won't let anyone else be called amazing!

data.text:
Not even you, Prez! I'll show everyone 
that I'm the greatest.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Not even you, Prez! I'll show everyone 
󠁿that I'm the greatest.

data.text:
I want to be just like you, Prez. That hasn't 
changed. You're my number one idol!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿I want to be just like you, Prez. That hasn't 
󠁿changed. You're my number one idol!

data.text:
But… that isn't it… I want to become so great 
that even you'd cheer me on and call me amazing!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿But… that isn't it… I want to become so great 
󠁿that even you'd cheer me on and call me amazing!

data.text:
And that's why I came to talk to you! Prez, this 
is my declaration of war!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿And that's why I came to talk to you! Prez, this 
󠁿is my declaration of war!

data.text: Say it clearly, Teio.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: 󠁿Say it clearly, Teio.

data.text:
Okay. One day I'll surpass your title of 
"Emperor" and become a Monarch in my own right.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Okay. One day I'll surpass your title of 
󠁿"Emperor" and become a Monarch in my own right.

data.text: So you better be prepared, Prez!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿So you better be prepared, Prez!!

data.text: Heh…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: 󠁿Heh…

data.text:
From the bleachers down to the turf… You've 
finally reached the same stage as I. I'm very 
happy for you, Teio.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
󠁿From the bleachers down to the turf… You've 
󠁿finally reached the same stage as I. I'm very 
󠁿happy for you, Teio.

data.text:
That being said, I have no intention of giving 
up the title of "strongest". I hope you 
understand just how difficult the road ahead is.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
󠁿That being said, I have no intention of giving 
󠁿up the title of "strongest". I hope you 
󠁿understand just how difficult the road ahead is.

data.text: Of course!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: 󠁿Of course!!

data.text:
As Tokai Teio nodded gleefully, Symboli Rudolf 
happily smiled back .
data.processed:
󠁿As Tokai Teio nodded gleefully, Symboli Rudolf 
󠁿happily smiled back .

data.text:
Woah, I actually managed to say it!! Ehehe, my 
heart is still racing though.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Woah, I actually managed to say it!! Ehehe, my 
󠁿heart is still racing though.

data.text:
Thank you for coming with me. Also, umm… thanks 
for everything you've done!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Thank you for coming with me. Also, umm… thanks 
󠁿for everything you've done!

data.text:
And… I'll be relying on you 
even more from now on!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: From now on? Does that mean…

data.processed:
󠁿And… I'll be relying on you 
󠁿even more from now on!

data.text:
Geez, you're so dense! If you keep that up, I 
won't let you be my trainer anymore.
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Geez, you're so dense! If you keep that up, I 
󠁿won't let you be my trainer anymore.

data.text:
Our target is the strongest Uma Musume in the 
world after all. So get it together, Trainer!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Our target is the strongest Uma Musume in the 
󠁿world after all. So get it together, Trainer!!

data.text:
Alrighty! I'm so happy, I did my declaration and 
I got a trainer to boot!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿Alrighty! I'm so happy, I did my declaration and 
󠁿I got a trainer to boot!!

data.text:
This is the start of the legend 
of the Unbeaten Tokai Teio!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
󠁿This is the start of the legend 
󠁿of the Unbeaten Tokai Teio!
